original_text:
Fetching Fruits
Tutti i provider che si rispettino mettono a disposizione dei giocatori almeno una slot a tema frutta. Il motivo è da ricercare nel grande fascino che racchiude questo tipo di giochi. La NewAge games ha rispettato le tre regole principali che possiamo ritrovare nelle Fruit Machine: semplicità, grafica non troppo sofisticata, simboli facilmente riconoscibili.
Prima di addentraci nella meccanica di gioco, vediamo come si presenta Fetching Fruits.
Lo sfondo della schermata nera lascia il posto al colore viola dei rulli, con simboli dalle linee essenziali e dal colore opaco.
Ai lati della griglia sono indicate le linee di pagamento, mentre in basso, procedendo da sinistra verso destra, troviamo il tasto Start, l’Autoplay, il variatore di puntata, il pulsante per effettuare la giocata massima, l’importo della vincita istantanea e totale. Ci sono poi le icone per disattivare la musica, quella per accedere al menù interno e infine quello che ci permette di ritornare alla schermata iniziale.
Anche il comparto musicale è abbastanza piacevole, con un motivetto di suoni elettronica e flauti e qualche effetto speciale in occasione delle vincite.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco è una classica 5×3, con 5 linee di pagamento fisse. La puntata minima è di 0,05 €, ma si possono scegliere importi di 0,10 €, o,20 €, 0,50 €, 1 €, 2,50 €, 5 € e infine 10 €. Più si scommette, più aumentano le possibilità di vincere. Come in quasi tutte le slot, le combinazioni vincenti si sviluppano dal primo rullo di sinistra procedendo verso destra.
L’Autoplay offre la possibilità di selezionare tra i 10 e i 100 giri automatici, con dei limiti di vincita o di perdita oltre i quali il gioco tornerà alla modalità manuale.
Simboli e funzionalità
In Fetching Fruits abbiamo nove simboli, suddivisi tra quelli di basso livello, che pagano meno, e quelli di alto livello che invece offrono ricompense importanti. Si vince associando da 3 a 5 simboli uguali.
Per le nostre prove abbiamo impostato la scommessa minima di 0,05 €. Le ciliegie e il limoni sono i simboli che pagano meno, da un minimo di 0,10 € (tre simboli), a un massimo di 1,50 € (5 simboli).
A seguire troviamo i numeri 9 e 10 che offrono vincite da 0,10 € sino a 1,50 €.
Con la prugna e l’anguria si sale di livello, con somme che vanno da 0,15 sino a 2 €.
L’arancio ripaga sino a un massimo di 5 €, mentre la campana è il simbolo con un valore più alto in assoluto, raggiungendo 50 €.
Naturalmente, aumentando la scommessa iniziale, le vincite aumentano, con somme da capogiro.
Pro e contro di Fetching Fruits
A noi questa slot è piaciuta, a partire dalla meccanica di gioco fluida che permette ai rulli di girare senza fastidiose interruzioni.
I simboli semplici e le linee di pagamento ben in evidenza ci sono sembrate adeguate, mentre invece ci saremmo aspettati qualcosa di più sul menù interno, scarno e senza riferimenti importanti come, ad esempio, la volatilità e l’RTP.

raw_translation.response:
Fetching Fruits
Any reliable provider worth its salt offers players at least one fruit-themed slot game. The reason lies in the great appeal that this type of game holds. NewAge Games has respected the three main rules that we can find in Fruit Machines: simplicity, non-too-sophisticated graphics, easily recognizable symbols.
Before delving into the gameplay mechanics, let's take a look at how Fetching Fruits presents itself.
The black screen background gives way to the purple color of the reels, with symbols of essential lines and opaque color.
The paylines are indicated on either side of the grid, while at the bottom, proceeding from left to right, we find the Start button, the Autoplay, the bet adjuster, the button to make the maximum bet, the amount of instant and total winnings. Then there are the icons to turn off the music, the one to access the internal menu, and finally the one that allows us to return to the initial screen.
The musical component is also quite pleasant, with a motif of electronic sounds and flutes and some special effects on occasion of wins.
Slot features
The game grid is a classic 5×3, with 5 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is €0,05, but you can choose amounts of €0,10, €0,20, €0,50, €1, €2,50, €5, and finally €10. The more you bet, the more chances you have of winning. As in almost all slots, winning combinations develop from the first reel on the left moving to the right.
Autoplay offers the possibility of selecting between 10 and 100 automatic spins, with win or loss limits beyond which the game will return to manual mode.
Symbols and functionality
In Fetching Fruits, we have nine symbols, divided between low-level ones, paying less, and high-level ones that instead offer significant rewards. You win by combining 3 to 5 identical symbols.
For our tests, we set the minimum bet to €0.05. Cherries and lemons are the symbols that pay the least, from a minimum of €0.10 (three symbols) to a maximum of €1.50 (5 symbols).
Next, we find the numbers 9 and 10, which offer winnings from €0.10 up to €1.50.
With the plum and watermelon, we step up a level, with sums ranging from €0.15 up to €2.
The orange pays up to a maximum of €5, while the bell is the symbol with the highest value, reaching €50.
Naturally, increasing the initial bet, the winnings increase, with dizzying sums.
Pros and cons of Fetching Fruits
We liked this slot, starting from the smooth gameplay mechanics that allow the reels to spin without annoying interruptions.
The simple symbols and clearly visible paylines seemed adequate to us, while we expected something more from the internal menu, which is bare and without important references such as volatility and RTP.

raw_translation.response:
"Fetching Fruits" - A Refreshing Take on Classic Fruit Machines

As a seasoned gambler, you know that fruit-themed slot machines are a staple in any self-respecting provider's catalog. And for good reason - the timeless appeal of these games is undeniable. NewAge Games has stayed true to the three main tenets of fruit machines: simplicity, unpretentious graphics, and easily recognizable symbols.

But let's dig deeper into "Fetching Fruits" before we get into the mechanics of the game.

The black background falls away to reveal purple reels adorned with symbols featuring clean lines and a matte finish. The paylines are marked on either side of the playing grid, while the lower section of the screen features the all-important "Start" button, the Autoplay function, the bet selector, the "Max Bet" button, the instant win amount, and total winnings indicators. Icons to mute the music, access the menu, and return to the home screen round out the controls.

The soundtrack is pleasant enough, with a catchy electronic melody accompanied by flute riffs and special effects for winning combinations.

The playing grid is a classic 5x3 with five fixed paylines. The minimum bet is just €0.05, but higher bets increase the chances of winning big. Winning combinations are formed by matching symbols from left to right, starting from the first reel.

The Autoplay function lets you set between 10 and 100 automatic spins, with limits on wins and losses that will revert the game back to manual mode.

There are nine different symbols in the game, divided into low- and high-paying ones. Cherries and lemons pay the least, ranging from €0.10 (for three symbols) to €1.50 (for five). The numbers 9 and 10 offer payouts from €0.10 to €1.50.

Moving up the payout scale, plums and watermelons offer rewards from €0.15 to €2, while oranges pay up to €5. The bell symbol is the highest-paying one in the game, offering a whopping €50 payout.

Overall, "Fetching Fruits" is a refreshing interpretation of a classic genre, with smooth gameplay and straightforward graphics. Though the menu could use some more details on volatility and RTP, this slot has our seal of approval.

Then there are the icons to turn off the music, the one to access the internal menu, and finally the one that allows us to return to the initial screen.

In Fetching Fruits, we have nine symbols, divided between low-level ones, paying less, and high-level ones that instead offer significant rewards. You win by combining 3 to 5 identical symbols.
